website_summaries.verdict: Is two pairs better than one? It depends. Olowahu is not adjustable and not as supportive as other Tevas. They look great, though, and offer more support than typical flip-flops.
pros: You get two pairs of sandals in one purchase
Crossover thong with smooth, lightweight tubular webbing
Soft topsole with enhanced arch support
Comes in numerous colors and patterns

customer_reviews.title: Logo's missing
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pair's of Teva's sandals and know they always have the (Teva R) logo on the strap and the Mush logo for the footbed. Even the pictures on the website showed the correct logo's. However, when I received my order the sandals I ordered only said Teva. They didn't look authentic to me and I almost feel as though they are fake. I'm thinking about returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kowalowski

customer_reviews.title: usually satisfactory, but...
customer_reviews.text: The solid black pair is fine. But the right sandal of the print pair was assembled incorrectly. The straps are connected so far back on the sole that 1) my heel extends behind the sole, 2) there is an inch of space in front of my toes, 3) the forward strap constantly slip off my toe. I was hoping I could "break them in" but they are basically not wearable, I always feel like I'm going to walk right out of my shoe and this is not acceptable as I walk dogs for a living.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy flip flops.
customer_reviews.text: These are great flip flops and the price is absolutely right. I'm a 10 and they might run the TINIEST bit small, but really I think they fit great. They're comfortable for sandals like this. The only thing is they initially turn your feet black as you're breaking them in. That's just a hazard of the foam material.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Imposters!
customer_reviews.text: These unfortunately are not the real thing. Online the photos show all the appropriate labels but upon arrival I received something completely different. Disclaimer, this would be my 3rd set of these sandals so I'm very familiar with the brand. These were smaller than normal, hard, no arch support and footbed logos missing. I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Minneapplemuffin

customer_reviews.title: The 2 pack isn’t the same size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never bought the duo before of 2 pairs of Tevas. The teal color fits me right, just like the other pairs I have worn in the past. But the black pair they throw in is a different size. So if you order a size 7 basically, the black pair is smaller. Why do they do this?? They make you think you’re getting a good deal but really you’re not. You’re getting 2 diff size shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tif

customer_reviews.title: Fit differently than in prior years
customer_reviews.text: First just let me say that the last pair of these sandals I bought lasted 2 years of heavy use and were the most comfortable sandals I've ever owned. The pairs I recently ordered are a bit less comfortable than the ones I bought 2 years ago. The straps are larger and do not fit snug against the top of the foot. They are still comfortable, but can not be worn in as many environments as they tend to slip off easily. Still, they look great and have very comfortable soles.
customer_reviews.author: kidsparrow37

customer_reviews.title: Love this style Teva
customer_reviews.text: Love this style Teva, very comfortable and feminine. I own many pairs, very pretty colors and great for the beach too. I have gotten my 95 year old mother multiple pairs too, she loves them. The older ones she uses for gardening and the dog park, newer ones she wears with her stylish outfits. We wear a 71\2 so we get size 8 (no half sizes).
customer_reviews.author: P.V.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: These fit true to size. They are really comfortable. I was a little worried because one of the straps felt a bit tight and was rubbing on my foot but after an hour of wearing them and breaking them in it went away. They are well made and are great for walking around sightseeing and for the beach. I'm very happy with how they look too. I needed a simple flip-flop but wanted something with a little bit of uniqueness and the extra straps on this make them look really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan

customer_reviews.title: These are different from ones I bought a few years ago.
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 pairs of size 7 Olowahu's from a few years ago. I wear a 7B feet a little wide and they fit great. These however are different. The place where the strap attaches to the sole is definitely closer together and are too tight for me. I asked Teva about it and they suggest going up a size, but I've tried the 8's and the soles are much bigger than my feet and don't look nice. The new ones are made in China and the old ones were made in El Salvador. I gave the pair away to a friend who has narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walls

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite sandals. I actually just bought this 2 pack to replace 2 pairs I bought a few years ago that hardly have any tread on the bottom from so much walking. They hold up a million times better than cheap flip flops. I wear them everywhere! They can be a little stiff when you first get them, but after wearing for a bit, the straps loosen up and the sole forms to your foot. I recommend these to all of my friends!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Morton

customer_reviews.title: Size up
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are great. I am on my feet all day in the summer and I need something that can get wet and still function. These are it. So far these have been very comfortable and I have had no complaints. I gave them 4 stars instead of 5 because I normally wear an 8 in everything and the 8 was too small. I had to return them for a 9. The straps and the length of the shoe was just too small!
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is about my 8th pair of Olowahu Teva sandals. I absolutely love them. I typically wear an 8.5 and the 8 definitely fits me much better than the 9 as the straps do stretch a little bit as you wear them and the footbed forms to the shape of your foot. I can walk in these sandals for hours without getting blisters.
customer_reviews.author: MNMom

customer_reviews.title: Love my Tevas
customer_reviews.text: I love Teva. These shoes are very comfortable. Even though they don't have a lot of arch support, they are much better than other flat sandals I have tried. The sole seems to mold to your foot over time, making them very comfortable for long wear. The package deal with two sets was nice, since I received black and the multi-colored options. This allows me to change them according to my outfit. The straps do run outside and between the toe, which I know is uncomfortable for some, but these are comfortable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stays on your feet
customer_reviews.text: I like these because they don't fall off your feet like traditional flip flops, espically if walking in water. However, you just can't slide into them so if you're taking them off/on frequently during the day, they may not be the right style for that purpose.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started buying these shoes around 5 years ago and will stick with them forever. Very comfortable and stylish and flat, which I like! When I worked in an office setting I'd keep a brown and black pair on hand because they match everything well and I buy the colorful ones for everyday use. I typically wear 9 to 9.5 and a 9 fits me perfectly. Keep in mind that the first day of wear the straps will be tight on your foot but it only takes about a day to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: hallie97

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Love love these shoes!! I bought two pair separately last year (brown and a black pair), and was so excited to find the 2 in 1 or BOGO option this time around. They’re absolutely worth the money!! They are super comfortable and go with just about any outfit you choose to wear. Picture is is of the second pair you get with the colorful pair. I wear between an 8 and 8 1/2 depending on the show. I purchased a size 8 and they fit perfectly with some wiggle room.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on great sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to summer sandals, and with regular wear—every other day or so—they'll last me a good two summers, sometimes three, before they start to wear out in the heel. What I love about these the most is the Mush footbed! If you've never worn Tevas with Mush before, what that basically means is that the footbed is super-cushioned-awesome, and over time, it starts to mold to the shape of your foot. Initially, the footbed stays pretty solid and flat, but the more you're on it, the more the Mush wears in and starts to adapt to your feet. You'll actually start to see little toe prints toward the front if you're wearing them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley White

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are for very narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: These are strictly for a much more narrow foot than what I have and I certainly don't have a wide foot. I am a solid nine medium and these are no where near wide enough for my foot to go in properly. It is a shame as the color was lovely and the black that comes with it is always a good staple. But these are a return. I gave them two stars for design aesthetics and what appears to be quality material and quality construction
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, clever design that looks good, stays on your feet.
customer_reviews.text: Lovely! These look great and they stay on my feet without my feet slipping or sliding around in the straps. Very comfortable, too. Because this is a 2-pack, there's a pair each for my daughter and me, which is good, because if it were just one pair, we might have to fight over who gets to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: lynnepear

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: I order a two pack. I received one pair. Clearly says two pack on package.
customer_reviews.author: DIANNA

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Cushy
customer_reviews.text: These are great little flip flops to wear someplace casual. I think they are much nicer looking than normal flip flops. I don't know how long they will wear yet, but I'm counting on the Teva brand. The footpad is soft, not quite as much support as I'd hoped, but cushy is nice if you aren't walking miles. They even have a small arch support! At two in the set, it is hard to go wrong! I'm a happy customer..
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Scalzo

customer_reviews.title: Love these flip-flops.
customer_reviews.text: Interesting that one shoe of the two right shoes in the two pack had a strap that was tight. The other three fit perfectly. These are the only flip flops I can wear on an every day basis because the straps go back far enough to hold the shoes in place and they have enough arch support to keep my feet from hurting at the end of the day. They look fine with a dress or with shorts.
customer_reviews.author: grandmagail98

customer_reviews.title: Always been a fan of the Teva Olowahu flip flop
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of the Teva Olowahu flip flop. It's the only casual sandal I wear in the summer and each pair lasts about 2-3 yrs. This double pack was a great price when I purchased, as it was cheaper per set as a double than single. I like the Olowahu design over the traditional thong flip flop as I feel it stays on my foot better. The bed of the foot also dries quickly after a day at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Kait Burke

customer_reviews.title: Runs very small!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7.5 in sandals so I sized up to and 8 in these to make sure they wouldn’t be too snug. Well they arrived after two weeks of waiting for them to be shipped and both pairs were way too small. The straps don’t fit on my feet correctly and they start to slide upwards on my feet pushing the sandals off.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: I had a pair of these from years ago and they are so worn in I wanted a new pair. This style is so comfortable and they mold to your feet. I was thrilled to find this 2 pack! They are the real deal, exact quality of the expensive first pair I got at a specialty outdoor shop.
customer_reviews.author: colleen smith

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these sandals -- they will be my go to sandals all summer long. I bought the two pack in brown and black. They are super comfy. The are a bit snug at first (I do have a little wider foot though). I thought I would for sure get blisters because they were snug, but nothing!! They have stretched comfortably to fit my foot perfectly. Love love love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Comfy! Long time buyer...
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. I tend to wear my shoes pretty hard, so I do go through a pair a year. They are always a little snug when they arrive but the straps and the base stretch and form to my foot really well. I was THRILLED when I saw I was able to order a 2-pack at this price. The colors that came were totally fine. Probably not the colors I would have picked individually, but they are working out with my clothing really well. I really recommend trying these out if you haven't. They are a simple flip flop, but have a lot of support and add a little something extra to an ensemble.
customer_reviews.author: Bussy Gower

customer_reviews.title: Great for plantar concerns
customer_reviews.text: This fit my size 7 feet just right. Half sizes may be an issue for some, but try a size up and you may be surprised. I tried them on and thought they would be too tight, but after walking for 5 minutes the straps settled and they were just right. I have a wide foot, so they can rub my pinkie toe a bit, but they are not horrible. They are comfortable and so far my plantar issues. I'm sure with more wear they will help more. They are already more comfortable than my cheap ON flipflops. I will buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd highly recommend Teva flip-flops
customer_reviews.text: I can no longer find these in casual brick and mortar establishments. Thankfully this particular style is still available and one can not beat the price of two for one. If you're picky about comfort (and I've tried on many brands); I'd highly recommend Teva flip-flops. I wear these a lot but not much beyond my residence. These will last you quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: No More Tea For You

customer_reviews.title: Quality sandals that last!
customer_reviews.text: Teva is hands down one of my favorite brands. I bought the 2 pack when I realized my other Tevas had chew marks on them from when my 13 year old dog was a PUPPY. Seriously, they have been around longer than my husband! They take a day or two to stretch and break in, but I adore these comfortable sandals. I will always own at least 2 pairs!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I was happy to find them online as the ones I had ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these before and needed replacements. I was happy to find them online as the ones I had were getting older, 4 years, and wanted new. These were just as sturdy, fit as well and looked great. Got 4 pairs! I can have one outside my back door for the yard, one to go to the mailbox (an acre away), one for going to the store and one for back up. Perfect! Glad to see a classic doesn't go out of style. I have many ask me where I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Where's the mush?
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't know how many pairs of olwahu flips I've had in my life. They used to have "mush" on the heel. That version was more comfortable than these, but I am still happy with them. They don't slip like traditional flips do.
customer_reviews.author: catsoverhusband

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding set of flip flops from Teva
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding set of flip flops from Teva - We are a ATeva family and have lots of pairs. Some going back to when the company first started and they are all still in great shape. These are no exception and the fact that you get 2 pairs works well if two people in your house have the same size like both my wife and daughter. They absolutely love the shoes and one of the great things they have both noticed is that they do not "stink" after long term wear and there hasn't been a strange adjustment period. Overall, we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MortyMouse

customer_reviews.title: To loose, to sloppy of a fit for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace my earth sandals that I loved.....initially the fit was tight...the straps were pretty tight but in a few days they loosened up the sandals felt pretty good. Comfortable and well cushioned. I thought I had found my replacement shoe. However, after having the sandals only a week, the straps have gone the other direction to being completely loose and sloppy. Now the sandals barely stay on my feet as I walk after just a week!!!! This does not make me happy as I now have to concentrate to keep the sandals on and I'm very fearful of falling and twisting my ankle or worse. I'm gonna see if they can be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie E

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite flip flops
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flip flops. I can wear them all day without my feet hurting, and the only time I had an issue was when I walked about 13 miles in a day, which is to be expected. I've used a pair of these for several summers and they are still in good shape. The straps are great for support and keep your heels fairly protected. I bought these two pairs due to the price, which you really can't beat. These were a great value and were the same Tevas that I love and use all summer. I got a pair of black and a pair of more colorful ones.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine H

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, versatile summer stables
customer_reviews.text: I love these double-banded Teva flip-flops. I've been buying them in different colors for several summers now. I normally don't wear flip-flops, b/c they don't have enough support and just too loose, but Teva's design really hugs the feet and provide great cushion and shock absorption. I can walk in these all day long. The colors are super cute too and easy to mix and match with my maxi dress/skirts.
customer_reviews.author: cchocolate

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have noted, if you are a half size, order up. I did just that and these fit so well. I wore them around the house for a few hours because they felt a little stiff at first. I would encourage anyone who finds them a bit uncomfortable to wear them for a little while before deciding to return them. I am so glad I did. And the criss cross strap pattern is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: math teacher

customer_reviews.title: Quality has decreased, the shoe is cheap version of what it used to be
customer_reviews.text: These were my favorite flip flops a few years ago. The most recent pairs I ordered are of a much lower quality than the pairs from previous years. The straps are not as strong and have loosened up so that the flip flop is not secure on my foot. The old pairs I have lasted for years. These only lasted for months. So sad, another clothing item lost to the sad cheap side of the fashion industry. I would gladly pay more for a quality shoe. What is wrong with people?
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: I bought the all black and the antique brown in my normal shoe size of 9 and they fit perfect. I did not have any "breaking in period" ...
customer_reviews.text: I owned hundreds of sandals/flip flops in my life and these Teva's are in the top 5 of my shoes. I bought the all black and the antique brown in my normal shoe size of 9 and they fit perfect. I did not have any "breaking in period" on either pair. The only thing I would I would say that is a little problem is sometimes when I put them on the straps get turned upside down, but like I said not a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Boykin

customer_reviews.title: Sandal Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: I have to have supportive shoes thanks to a few bouts with plantar fascitis. These sandals are perfect for people who have foot pain. I can wear them all day long and not have foot pain at night or the next day. They are also quite sturdy. I don't know how many times people have stepped on them and I thought they were going to separate from the foam, but they never have. This is a great sandal - I have two pairs of them.
customer_reviews.author: Spears

customer_reviews.title: Love these flip flops
customer_reviews.text: Love these flip flops! The only thing that I don't like, is sometimes when my feet get warm and sweaty they squeak. This two pack is seriously the best deal! I saw them on sale at the mall, but nothing beat this package deal. The are so comfty. They don't slip and the multiple straps make it a more snug fit so I don't worry about them falling loose.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Seem cheaper
customer_reviews.text: These seem like a cheaper version of Teva Olowahu Sandler’s I have previously purchased. I will wear them but would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love them, just a few issues
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes; they match basically anything and are very comfortable. That being said, I expected a little more solid of a bottom, it seems like it's just foam throughout. Also they are slim, I wish they came in wide. I usually wear 8.5 or 9 so I ordered 9 to be on the safe side, but they are pretty snug. Overall I still love them, my advice is order a size larger than normal, and maybe find a place where you can select wide if you don't have narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: natty

customer_reviews.title: L-O-V-E these!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a loyal Teva wearer!!! I was introduced to this brand about 10 years ago and haven't owned another brand since. I have tried a lot of different styles over the years but these are my favorite! The olowahu are super comfy and the criss cross straps make it easy to keep them on your feet. After wearing them for a while they will fit your foot like a glove (or maybe a sock since we are talking about feet...haha) Have no fear at the price, these will last you for 2 or 3 years at which point you will sadly discard them and run out to find another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet!
customer_reviews.text: These are slippery when wet! I wore them when 8 months pregnant and after walking through wet grass they got so slippery that I fell! Very scary when you're that pregnant. Something similar happened just the other day as I was trying to hurry with my 2 month old baby through the rain. My sandals got so slippery and I could barely keep my balance. This event actually prompted me to post this review. They also make my feet stinky. Very embarrassing... I definitely would not recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: cushy little flip flops
customer_reviews.text: i've owned dozens of these flip flops. they are comfy,cute, well-made. i love sandals but will not buy cheap crap from the drug store. we all know these are not the best footwear but at least buy some decent sandals with great cushioning and a bit of arch support. paint your toenails and off you go!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Salecker

customer_reviews.title: I've loved these sandals for years
customer_reviews.text: Warning: Do not leave these sandals in a hot car with the soles facing up! I'm in the process of moving and many of my belongings had to stay in the car on a 95 degree day. This is the result of one of my sandals facing out toward the window; the other seems unaffected. I've loved these sandals for years, but was disappointed to see that these are narrower around the arch. They flare strangely toward the toe and heel, not really taking the natural shape of my foot. Still as comfy as ever, so I'm sad that I barely got two weeks of use out of one pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Cloud walker
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and stylish. Like walking on clouds! Double pack - one brown pair, one black pair, perfect basic color needs for wardrobes of summer. Dropped one star in rating only because the black pair left shoe was just a tad bit longer than the right. No one will notice - and its not a problem for wear...but it was not perfect match in manufacturing. Highly recommend these- would certainly buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Classic country girl

customer_reviews.title: Teva makes THE best sport/casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love all tevas - high quality, great styles & best support!!! I am not buying any other brand anymore - total waste of my money & comfort. Teva mush are my favorite flip flops. I am size 9 but buy size 8 because they do lengthen a bit after wearing a short time. They mold to your feet & are very lightweight. When I wear any other brand & walk even a short while (I have tried alot of other sports brands - I am shoeaholic), my feet will hurt alot from previous broken bones & fibromyalgia. I have not seen a lower price for 2 prs anywhere else. Love all the different patterns & colors.
customer_reviews.author: Hope3

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!
customer_reviews.text: I have another pair of TEVA's that I have worn for a couple of years. They were far beyond needing to be replaced. I have always loved them and once broken in I feel like they give good arch support. (I have very high arches) I haven't worn the cheap flip flops since I've owned these b/c these give such great support that I now am a flip flop snob. :)
customer_reviews.author: Fish Review

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than my other size 9's.
customer_reviews.text: I wear an 8 1/2 and bought the size 9. The black pair fit looser than other ones (6 pairs) I have in this size but the brown ones are looser than any I've had before. I took the tape measure to them and they are being made bigger. The size 8's might fit????? Could I keep the black pair and get the brown ones in an 8???????
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I owned this exact same pair for at least 10 years until I finally had to give them up as the soles were worn. While the soles were worn the straps still looked brand new. I wear these almost daily in the warm months so that says a lot to the quality of these shoes! When I saw this deal for 2 for less than $25 I had to jump on it to replace the old ones (that were on my feet as I placed the order!). These are THE BEST flip flops I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Meli D

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandal ever!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable sandal ever! This is probably by 6th or 7th pair of this style. They have a slight arch support. I have a bunion on my right foot, and these do not cause a problem. They do lose some of the cushioning after a year or so. I live in Texas and wear them almost year round, though. I check prices on different colors. Have twice purchased two pairs for the price of one by choosing a not so popular color
customer_reviews.author: P. Antwerp

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. I recently bought five pair based on my prior purchase of these sandals. They are comfortable and have a slight rise near the arch for support. I am a 7 1/2 and have always ordered the 8 as they only come in whole sizes, and fit beautifully. They come in a variety of colors and feel cushiony. They do not fall off your feet and I believe they are fairly attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel S

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, not what they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I've bought the Olowahu sandal and I'm quite disappointed. I loved my first two pairs and was excited to get 2 pairs for such a reasonable price. Unfortunately, the fit is awkward, not too big or small but it seems like the straps are positioned poorly making them uncomfortable to walk in. Also, the sole is not of the quality I'd come to expect from Teva. Cannot recommend and don't think I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lellis

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are my 5th and 6th pairs of these. I have multiple colors, lost one and wore some out. They really are my favorite shoes and are much better than going barefoot in the house! I originally got them when I was suffering with plantar fasciitis and they were great for that. They provide the best arch support of any shoes I have, including tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Love my tevas. This is my second purchase in 5 years- these things last a long time. I could have kept wearing my old ones but the tread was down to nothing and they got a little slick. Best sandals ever!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Simpson

customer_reviews.title: WRONG THING DELIVERED
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two pair size 7. I received one pair size 9. So I reordered. Received two pair size 5. Reordered again, received one pair, correct size. I just ordered again. Wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: Super Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these flip flops. I had a pair for about ten years and finally decided to get rid of them. I was thrilled that I could find new inked on Amazon. The only difference is that the straps are a bit narrower and the base is not the same. The older version is "Mush" which was a bit more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: Flip flops fit same as before. Just not as comfortable as usual, not sure if these are real tevas because the logos aren’t the same either. Considering returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved Teva. I bought these late spring this year ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always loved Teva. I bought these late spring this year and have lived in them. They have held up. Don't need new ones when usually after a summer of everyday wear all the other brands I've bought need to be retired. I will be purchasing another set for my teenage daughter so she will stop stealing mine.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: It took about a month to really break them in and be comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: After reading several of the reviews, I ordered 1/2 a size up. I normally wear 6 1/2, but the 7 for these flip flops fit me greatly. When I first got them, the strap between my toes would chafe such that I couldn't wear them for longer than an hour or 2. It took about a month to really break them in and be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Oh yes! Tevas are the best.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes rock. Can't beat the price for 2 pairs of Tevas!!! I was nervous at first because I thought I had possibly ordered wedges even though the picture showed flat sandals (I am 5'10" and don't want to be any taller) but they were as pictured. Very happy with my purchase. These are my 3rd and 4th pair of Tevas (the first ones got stolen and I wore the second ones out after several years of use) and the first Olowahu style shoes I have owned. They stick to your feet and look fancier than just regular flip flops. I can wear them to work and get away with it. Fantastic buy, thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Rough fabric between the toes
customer_reviews.text: The material was rough and rubbed between my toes. I also did not like the soft conforming layer on top. It's a shame, because I have a pair of these that are 10 years old and I loved them. These are not the same.
customer_reviews.author: smartshopper

customer_reviews.title: Want Happy Feet?
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable flip flops in the world. I can walk miles in these shoes. I buy several pairs just in case teva decides to change the style. These have gone up in price from my first pair but I really don't care. These top my list of ultimate favorite things. I usually wear them down until there are holes in the soles.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend, especially with it being 2 for 1.
customer_reviews.text: Had them last summer and were comfortable but probably only wore them a few hours a day here and there. Took them to Hawaii just last month, wore them a lot, sometimes all day and worked great. I do not like shoes, like thongs, that just have the one strap. I need something that keeps the strap from constantly being in between my twos. These are good for me. I can't normally wear flat shoes all day without my back hurting but these were ok, just enough support.
customer_reviews.author: ninnie4eight

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I generally wear an 8.5-9 and had to order an 8 in these flips flops. They are, however, a perfect fit for my foot at this size. I love, love, love that you do not have to lift your toe to keep them firmly on your feet, and they are so much better in the rain than any other flip flop I’ve ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: I love my teva sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love my teva sandals! I got the 2 pair pack. I love that they stay on my feet better than regular flip flops. I wore them all vacation long in Orlando-going between Disneyworld, Universal Studios and the beach and they worked like champs for me. They have held up over the last couple of years and I still wear them frequently.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Q

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant at first because they weren't exactly like my old ones
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old teva's that broke after 6 years. I was hesitant at first because they weren't exactly like my old ones, but That was quickly replaced with love for these. I am glad I got the Black pair and Brown Pair. I hope to get just as much use out of these as my last pair.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Carnes

customer_reviews.title: They're my favorite shoe this summer
customer_reviews.text: I wear these ALLLLLL the time. They're my favorite shoe this summer. At first the straps felt tight, but after 2 days wearing them around the house, they had stretched comfortably (I dare say perfectly) for my feet. They're the kind of sandal that conforms to your foot (I mean, they're pretty much foam, right?) so it might be impossible for them to be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit
customer_reviews.text: These had a weird fit around the big toe. Comfrotable, but didn't like that part. Had to send back :-(
customer_reviews.author: N James

customer_reviews.title: The thing I'm most writing on, is that I ...
customer_reviews.text: The thing I'm most writing on, is that I did not realize for some reason, I was buying TWO pairs of shoes here. But that's what it comes with. I also ordered purple straps but got black with white stitching. I am testing them out now, I am afraid the soles will leave the bottoms of my feet black as has happened with other shoes. If so, I will amend here :) Had I gotten one pair for the price, I would be upset by the quality. But having gotten two, I think they are fair priced.
customer_reviews.author: S. Duenn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love Tevas! This particular design and color gets me a lot of compliments from friends. So comfortable and great to wear at the beach as they can get wet without a problem. Fit perfectly and arrived fast, I definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Love Tevas
customer_reviews.text: Have worn many Teva sandals over my life time. I buy no other brand. Great styles, attractive, easy to pack, and pretty much perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Gerard

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sandals
customer_reviews.text: I like that these have the arch support that is missing in most sandals, which is the main reason I am a devoted fan of Teva. They are also quite attractive and come in many colors. I have been buying the Olowahu Sandal for many years so I was a little disappointed that they are a little less "squishy" than in years past, hence only 4 stars. They still far outweigh most sandals that I have owned over the years and I will continue buying them when they wear out.
customer_reviews.author: T Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandals Ever!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are SO comfortable and always look great. I love wearing sandals but have run into problems with plastic thong pieces and flimsy construction. These are the perfect remedy! The fabric straps always feel comfortable and they have so much support my heels don't hurt at the end of the day. The multiple straps provide extra support as well as make them look a bit more dressy than typical flip-flops. These are the 3rd pair of brown ones i've owned and i'm excited to have them in black for the first time. I look forward to wearing both pairs out!
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: BEST FLIP FLOPS EVER
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of Teva flip flops for at least 5 years. They aren't worn out, but after wearing them almost daily, they did lose a bit of cushioning (one of the great attributes of these flip flops, along with the good arch support). I've never had a more comfortable pair of sandals and the 2 new pair I received (in black and bracken colors) are the same high quality as my first pair. These are must-haves if you like sandals but need cushioned soles and arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Koepple

customer_reviews.title: Great value but not my cup of tea.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't particularly like how squishy they felt but then again, I like firmer flip flops. My daughter likes squishier flip flops so I had her try them on. She did not like the straps as some of them were too tight and others were really loose. I'm not sure if she had worn them and broke them in if they would've fit better but she and I both have only tried them on.
customer_reviews.author: Asian 40DD

customer_reviews.title: Cute! Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great everyday summer sandal. Really good price for the Teva name.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Roetman

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Teva!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this style of Teva! I've had a pair for many years and knew I'd need new ones soon. I wear a 8.5 in athletic shoes, but from previous experience, knew to order a size 7. I don't like a lot of extra shoe hanging off my heel. So glad the design has stayed the same, or at least it feels the same to me. Happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My fifth pair? Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: I think these are my fifth or sixth pairs of Teva Olowahus. I can walk in them all day - perfect for around the house, to the beach, walking the dog etc. Great product
customer_reviews.author: RFW

customer_reviews.title: Oh so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sandals!! Super lightweight with a cushy top layer that makes them so comfortable. I wear an 8-1/2 but ordered a 9 since my feet are slightly wide and they fit perfectly. Honestly, I expected them to be a little heavier weight but actually love that they are so lightweight. I normally wouldn't order flip-flops in September but I got them for a fall trip to Hawaii and now am already thinking about getting some for next summer. I couldn't be more satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Pam K.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I know there were some mixed reviews, but the two pairs I received were great. They fit exactly as I expected them to (they were replacing some identical Tevas I've had for years), the straps were not too wide or loose (and I have narrow feet, so that was a concern for me), and they were a perfect fit for a great price. I'd highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: J. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: ... pack came with a black pair that was completely comfortable from day one
customer_reviews.text: This 2 pair pack came with a black pair that was completely comfortable from day one. The other pair fits strangely, and my baby toe keeps coming out. I'm working on breaking the second pair in.
customer_reviews.author: Valley Teacher

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these sandals. Favorite sandals ever. They're super squishy and comfy and the strappy straps are so cute. I have only good things to say about these
customer_reviews.author: jayden

customer_reviews.title: sandal comfort
customer_reviews.text: sandals are just long enough. Initially the straps were a bit tight but stretched out after wearing a few times and now are fine. They look good and are comfortable. Good deal since I got the 2 pack. The second pair are black and fit much the same. After wearing a couple of times they fit MY foot. I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: enjoy a bagel

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. Typically, I wear a size 6 1/2 sneaker and a 7 for shoes that are shaped more like pumps. A 7 in these fit very comfortably. I bought my first pair of these about 8 years ago. I have been tempted to buy other "flip flops" that are cuter, but there are none that are more comfortable. They are like walking on pillows. You can spend hours in them, in hot, humid, foot swelling conditions, and they are still comfortable. If you find a deal on a 2 pack, don't hesitate to stock up.
customer_reviews.author: SR of Mechanicville

customer_reviews.title: I love this flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I love this flip flops. They are extra confortable. I will not use any other type. I was happy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Denisse

customer_reviews.title: They are cute and have nice patterns.
customer_reviews.text: There were 2 sets of shoes in the pack. I found them to be a lil on the small side. The straps across my feet were tight. And the soles were a little thin that I could feel if I stepped on a rock. I guess I am just used to the soles of crocs. They are cute and have nice patterns.
customer_reviews.author: gemini2576

customer_reviews.title: Can't stand anything between my toes. The way these ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't stand anything between my toes. The way these are designed, they put not pressure on that sensitive area. Been buying this style for about 8 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: These are more cushy/soft than I expected! They are extremely comfortable and they mold to your feet after just a few wears. They're difficult to put on at first because the straps are not very rigid, but it becomes much easier once they conform to your feet. I don't have to work to keep these on while walking and I've walked all over town in these, for hours, and my feet don't hurt at all.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Flip Flops!
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are fantastic because of a few reasons. One, the multiple straps keep the shoe on tight but comfortably. Two, there is a bit of arch support so for someone like me with a bad back its great. These are comfortable enough to wear all day. I bought multiple pairs.
customer_reviews.author: RIRedd

customer_reviews.title: Favorite flip flops
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these for years. I wear them all summer and buy new ones every couple of years as they get worn down when they are on sale. These actually seem thicker now than in previous years, so might not have to replace them any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: While these fit as I expected and are pretty comfortable with decent arch support, I'd have to say that they are not quite as well made as a similar pair I bought several years ago. Love the color of these and the fact there was a bonus pair in solid black.
customer_reviews.author: Bookpusher

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sandals
customer_reviews.text: Price was right--2 pairs for $25. Very cute design, the thin straps make them a dressier choice for flip-flops. They are quite comfy and offer a fair amount of arch support, which is important for those of us with older, slightly worn down feet. I ordered my usual size (11) and they fit fine. Another good purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and durable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these based on recommendations from several friends. I'm impressed! On our longest day of walking on the so far hottest day of the summer in New Orleans, my feet didn't ache or sweat in these. They are very comfortable! I'm even shocked that the soles even look practically new still!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: I love how they form to the shape of my foot
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Teva flip flops for years. I love how they form to the shape of my foot. These flip flops seem to be too tight when you first put them on, but after wearing them all day once or twice they fit perfectly! my foot can just slide right in and they are so much more comfortable than normal flip flops. I will never buy another brand of flip flop ever again!!
customer_reviews.author: A.M.

customer_reviews.title: Too bad, because they were cute
customer_reviews.text: These were SOOOO small! I couldn't even get the front half of my foot in. Too bad, because they were cute! And who doesn't love Tevas?!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the most comfortable sandles I’ve ever tried
customer_reviews.text: I live in these flip flops. Absolutely the most comfortable sandles I’ve ever tried. I have worn the Olowahu flip flops for many years. I find the double strapping on the Olowahu much better than the single strap.
customer_reviews.author: Nila Smith

customer_reviews.title: My favorite sandals
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair like these over a year ago at a DSW here in Florida. I wore them as much as possible, because they were so very comfortable. I am 65, and many women my age are having foot problems. I always suggest they try these! I ordered this set of 2 pair only because my "old" ones were rather worn on the bottom, and I was afraid I'd have to discard them before I was able to order more. Now my "old" pair is my around-the-house pair. I'll keep wearing this brand and style as long as Teva makes them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Chrzanowski

product_meta.title: Teva Women's Olowahu Set of Two Pairs of Flip-Flops
product_meta.description:
Bundle package of sandal pairs in multiple colors

Teva offers something a little different to kick around in this summer. Ideal for the beach, poolside or backyard play, this sandal is made with a soft yet sturdy nylon webbing in a cute criss-cross strap design that will hold the foot in place much more effectively than your average flip flop. The cushy EVA footbed offers plenty of comfort and arch support, while the treaded rubber outsole provides great grip on wet and dry surfaces.

Teva is an authentic icon in the outdoor industry. Founded in the early 1980's by a Colorado River guide, Teva pioneered the sport-sandal category. For more than 20 years on rivers, in canyons, and across the trails of the great outdoors, athletes and enthusiasts have traveled the globe comfortably and confidently in Teva footwear. Providing positive contributions to the world in which we play is at the core of everything Teva stands for. The Teva name itself is a Hebrew word meaning "nature" and the hand logo is the Hopi symbol for "friendship" and "water." Teva supports the outdoor athletic lifestyle and remains committed to innovation in outdoor performance footwear, the platforms which carry enthusiasts beyond the offices of the day-to-day and onto the rivers, trails, and canyons of the next adventure.

See more
